title: One Piece Episode #553 Anime Review
author: Chris Beveridge
description: A review of episode 553 published on the day of its Japanese broadcast, discussing Shirahoshi's revelation about Otohime's assassination and the episode's emotional impact.

title: Sam's Piece: Ten of the Most Well-Made One Piece Episodes
author: Sam
description: An editorial highlighting exceptionally well-animated One Piece episodes. Features episode 553 and specifically praises the animation of Luffy emerging from Megalo and kicking Hody Jones as 'some of the coolest animation on a TV budget, period.'

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Article covers multiple episodes across different arcs up to Dressrosa

title: One Piece – Fishman Island Arc (Episodes 539 – 553) Review
author: Hogan Reviews
description: A comprehensive review of the latter portion of the Fishman Island arc, including episode 553. Discusses Shirahoshi's revelation about Hody killing Otohime, Luffy's dramatic entrance from Megalo, and the thematic significance of the 'friend or foe' question.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Full spoilers for Fishman Island arc episodes 539-553

title: 553-554: 'Shirahoshi's Tears! Luffy Finally Shows up!' and 'A Big Clash! the Straw Hats vs. a Hundred Thousand Enemies!'
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: A blog post reviewing episodes 553-554 from the perspective of someone watching One Piece for the first time. Praises how Oda handled the moral complexity without altering Luffy's character.

title: One Piece 553 Luffy kicks Hody
author: Unknown
description: Video clip of the iconic moment when Luffy emerges from Megalo's mouth and kicks Hody Jones with a Gear 2 powered attack.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Shows the climactic moment of episode 553

title: 10 Best One Piece Episodes in the Fishman Island Arc, Ranked
author: CBR Staff
description: A ranking article of the best episodes in the Fishman Island arc. Discusses the arc's key moments including Shirahoshi's revelation and Luffy's confrontation with Hody.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire Fishman Island arc

title: One Piece Episode 553 - Shirahoshi's Tears! Luffy Finally Shows Up!
author: Toei Animation
description: Official streaming source for episode 553 on Crunchyroll, available with English subtitles.
